mapper.insert: insert into project_info (user_id, project_name, created_by, creation_date, last_updated_by, last_update_date, project_content) values (#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{lastUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{projectContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update project_info set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, project_name = #{projectName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=CHAR}, creation_date = #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_updated_by = #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=CHAR}, last_update_date = #{lastUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, project_content = #{projectContent,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select id, user_id, project_name, created_by, creation_date, last_updated_by, last_update_date, project_content from project_info where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select id, user_id, project_name, created_by, creation_date, last_updated_by, last_update_date, project_content from project_info
